about_the_game:
Available today for every citizen of Feagu, a new operating system - built for both your professional and personal use.

Browse your email, visit the world wide web, do office tasks, and much more!

Note: "Much more" is a non-claimable benefit provided only to citizens with a high behavior index score.

Features:

  • A highly stylized design, built with the good of the people in mind!

  • No tracking, no spying, and certainly no hidden cameras!

  • Your own friend, PEP! The... Positive energy... provider! Yes, yes. That's what it stands for.

  • A state-of-the-art operating system with ZERO vulnerabilities! No pesky viruses!

  • Gain citizen behavior points by helping your beautiful country's administration!

So make the switch today, and install Pep OS. Turn your back to the antique, bloated operating systems of the west.

What to really expect from this experience?

  • Navigate through and solve puzzles within a early 2000's like operating system

  • Discover the true intentions of the operating system and its assistant

  • Remove the malicious code from Pep, and make a lifetime friend!

name: PepOS - Our Operating System

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G (G1840 etc), ideally using DDR3 RAM or better
  • Graphics: Integrated with DirectX 9 Support
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
